description: Find the available VM extensions for a subscription and region.

commands.name: az vm extension image list
commands.summary: List the information on available extensions.
examples: az vm extension image list --query "[].publisher" -o tsv | sort -u
az vm extension image list --query "[].name" -o tsv | sort -u | grep Docker

az vm extension image list --query \
    "[?starts_with(publisher, 'Microsoft.Azure.App')].publisher" \
    -o tsv | sort -u | xargs -I{} az vm extension image list-names --publisher {} -l westus

commands.name: az vm extension image list-names
commands.summary: List the names of available extensions.
examples: az vm extension image list-names --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions -l westus --query "[?starts_with(name, 'Docker')]"
az vm extension image list-names --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions -l westus --query "[?starts_with(name, 'Custom')]"

commands.name: az vm extension image list-versions
commands.summary: List the versions for available extensions.
examples: az vm extension image list-versions --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions -l westus -n DockerExtension -o table

commands.name: az vm extension image show
examples: az vm extension image show -l westus -n CustomScript --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions --version 2.0.2

az vm extension image list-versions --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions -l westus -n DockerExtension --query "[].name" -o tsv | sort | tail -n 1
az vm extension image show -l westus --publisher Microsoft.Azure.Extensions -n DockerExtension --version LatestVersion
